Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-gir <!nogir>, gir1.2-gee-0.8-dev <!nogir>, gir1.2-gio-2.0-dev <!nogir>, gir1.2-glib-2.0-dev <!nogir>, gir1.2-gobject-2.0-dev <!nogir>, gir1.2-json-1.0-dev <!nogir>, gnome-common, intltool, libgee-0.8-dev, libglib2.0-dev, libjson-glib-dev, libmarisa-dev (>> 0.3~), python3-marisa, python3:any, valac
Description: Japanese Kana Kanji input library libkkc provides a converter from Japanese Kana-string to Kana-Kanji-mixed-string. It was named after kkc.el in GNU Emacs, a simple Kana Kanji converter, while libkkc tries to convert sentences in a bit more complex way using N-gram language models.
Package-List: gir1.2-kkc-1.0 deb introspection optional arch=any libkkc-common deb utils optional arch=all libkkc-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libkkc-utils deb utils optional arch=any libkkc2 deb libs optional arch=any
